attributes.action: continue with the scheme to scrap road tax in favour of the new road pricing policy
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
In response to the petition against this new policy surely the opposite side of the fence should have the chance to voice their opinion.

The new scheme of road tax is a step forward in reducing both congestion and pollution in our country. 

Although the fuel taxation does do this to some extent it is not enough. On the other hand the current taxation scheme is weighted far too heavily on the side of heavy drivers. They are causing problems which lesser road users are having to pay for. It's time to even the balance surely?
